alert.note: Alert for Lower Chehalis Valley Area; Southwest Interior; Tacoma Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 10:02PM PST until December 20 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Lowlands of Thurston, western Lewis, and far southeast Mason Counties, including Harstine Island, Olympia, Centralia, and Toledo, Tacoma and vicinity, including Vaughn, Gig Harbor, Fox Island, Anderson Island, DuPont, Puyallup, and Spanaway and Far southwest Mason County and the interior lowlands of Grays Harbor County, including Matlock, McCleary, and Montesano. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A rain or rain to snow mix is likely during this period.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Chehalis Valley Area; Southwest Interior; Tacoma Area
